title: Black Panels in Patcher

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I built my PC a couple of days ago and installed all my games, I left league for the last since it wasn't on Steam or Battle.net and when it finished patching overnight I had black panels with only free champions and the patch. Is there a fix to this, I've tried reinstalling twice and it works at first but after patching it does the same thing. I'm on Windows 10 Home if that matters.

replies.body: This may not necessarily an issue with game files that would require a repair, but actually a network issue failing to download assets.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection is configured to establish a connection and keeping it steady.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure some settings, like your firewall.  Hope that helps!

Thanks so much, used the repair tool and used the change dns setting and worked like a charm. Quick tip for anyone with this issue, when you use the hextech repair tool hold shift and right click the icon to use admin mode. Anyways thanks Porocles :)
